question: Which of the following statements regarding the Pacific Ring of Fire are correct?
option1: The Ring of Fire is a direct result of plate tectonics which is the movement and collisions of lithospheric plates.
option2: It is the most seismically active region of the world as about 90% of the world’s earthquakes occur along the Ring of Fire.
option3: The Ring of Fire is a major area in the basin of Atlantic Ocean where a large number of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions occur.
explanation: The Ring of Fire is a direct result of plate tectonics which is the movement and collisions of lithospheric plates. The Ring of Fire is a major area in the basin of Pacific Ocean where a large number of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions occur. It has more than 75% of the world’s active and dormant volcanoes and about 90% of the world’s earthquakes occur along the Ring of Fire.
